2.0.name: wordpress/simply-picasaweb
2.0.description: Display thumbnails from one of your public picasaweb albums (or all albums) in either your blogs template (sidebar) or alternatively within a blog posting. This is a very simple plugin that takes the feed generated by your picasaweb account and generates clean and simple html for display.
